TopicTitle: A List of Planet Packs for KopernicusTech

Articles.Content:
Gravitasi should really link this on the KopernicusTech thread.

**Normal Planet Packs**

[**Kerbol+ by amarius1**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/112339-0-90-WIP-KopernicusTech-Kerbol-Plus-v-1-4)

[**Kohman by markothefan1**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/110804-WIP-KopernicusTech-Kohman-Pack-v1)

[**Kirius by \_Augustus\_ and SiriusB**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/111439-KopernicusTech-The-Kirius-System-Version-0-6)

[**Outer Planets Mod by CaptRobau, Eudae55, and various others**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/104280-0-90-Outer-Planets-Mod-%281-5-5-1%29-TextureReplacer-incompatibility-fixed-1-Mar)**, in addition to various expansions**

[**Porp by Lillz**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/110710-WIP-Porp-Gas-Giant-System-0-15)

[**Terrestrial Planets by sdj64**](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/590/Terrestrial%20Planets%20Pack)

**RSS Expansions**

[**srbgaming's RSS Expansion**](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/638/Real%20Solar%20System%20Expansion%20Pack%20-%20Dwarf%20Planets%2C%20Moons%2C%20and%20more)

A new organized thread for this, sweet. I missed when your Kopernicus Core page has the planet pack list.

(By the way, hate to criticize but you forgot to put Minor Bodies and Trans-Keptunian.)
